oppression.question: Have I mistreated others through my words, deeds, or actions?
oppression.description: It's a sin to execute an unjust and cruel exercise of power or authority over others instead of respecting the God-given dignity of every human person.

extracted_data_phrases: through unjust exercise of authority over them
oppression.question: Did I mistreat others through unjust exercise of authority over them?
oppression.description: It's a sin to execute an unjust and cruel exercise of power or authority over others instead of respecting the God-given dignity of every human person.

extracted_data_phrases: in any unjust or cruel behavior towards others
through your words , actions , or decisions
oppression.question: Did you engage in any unjust or cruel behavior towards others through your words, actions, or decisions?
oppression.description: It's a sin to execute an unjust and cruel exercise of power or authority over others instead of respecting the God-given dignity of every human person.

envy.question: Have I secretly compared my own blessings to those of others, feeling discontent and wishing they wouldn't have what I don't?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control and speak to others with profanity, causing them to be offended?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: with words that were hurtful , discourteous , or unbecoming of a Christian
incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control and speak to others with words that were hurtful, discourteous, or unbecoming of a Christian?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

gluttony.question: Did you overindulge in eating or drinking, neglecting your physical well-being and wasting resources that could have been used for more important needs?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

gluttony.question: Have you overindulged in eating or drinking, neglecting moderation and temperance?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking to excess
especially during times of celebration or leisure activities
gluttony.question: Did you indulge in eating or drinking to excess, especially during times of celebration or leisure activities?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in discussing others ' faults or private affairs
through conversations that took place while engaging in leisurely activities such as walking or hiking
in leisurely activities such as walking or hiking
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing others' faults or private affairs, even if what I shared was true, through conversations that took place while engaging in leisurely activities such as walking or hiking?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: in sharing private concerns about others
through casual conversations with friends or acquaintances
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing private concerns about others, even if they were true, through casual conversations with friends or acquaintances?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: in another 's mistakes or private matters
gossip.question: Have I spoken words that delighted in another's mistakes or private matters, even if what was shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: in relationships that matter most to me
anger.question: Have I nursed anger rather than seeking reconciliation in relationships that matter most to me?
anger.description: Uncontrolled anger corrupts our own heart, damages our relationship with both God and neighbor.
